about_the_game:
When the city-state of Marito falls on hard times, it submits to annexation by the expansive Vanderland Empire. But not all in Marito are pleased by their new overlords, and dissent is brewing. Felicia Arde, a stoic and accomplished imperial knight, is given an important task: go to Marito and win the support of the people by any means necessary. Leaving behind her fiance, she travels to unfamiliar shores to carry out her duty...Meet the people of Marito and do whatever you can to win their approval. Felicia can delve into the surrounding dungeons to collect ingredients and relics for the locals, or she can stay in town to assist them in other ways. How you choose to win fame and friendship will affect Felicia's, and Marito's, future. Will you become a hero? Or start a new life you never imagined?Traditional RPG Combat

You'll be adventuring with companions while you fight off enemies in traditional RPG combat! Mix and match your party to find a playstyle that suits you best!

Varying Dungeons

There is a variety of dungeons to explore, from deep forests to icy plains. Venture forth with your party and experience a journey unlike any other!

Unique NPCs

There are a number of colorful personalities to meet and win over, from street thugs to noblemen. How will you win their support?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
